name: higgsboson
description: Native css classes to style native components.

scripts.build:watch: npx postcss ./src/theme/index.css --use postcss-import postcss-copy-assets postcss-nesting postcss-extend autoprefixer --output ./dist/higgsboson.css --watch
scripts.build: npx postcss ./src/theme/index.css --use postcss-import postcss-copy-assets postcss-nesting  postcss-extend postcss-csso  autoprefixer --output ./dist/higgsboson.min.css
